📌 NONSTICK COATING: do not use metal utensils when cooking waffles or cleaning, do not use abrasive detergents or cloths to clean

results.title: Simplus Air Fryer 5L/3.5L Digital Screen/Knob Control 1500W 60min/1300W 30min Timer Oil-free Dehydration
results.description:
⭐ Who Are We
Simplus provides high quality home appliances for all customers in South East Asia. We produce well-designed, reliable, easy-to-use and cost-effective smart products to make life up easily. From personal healthy to home improvement, we help you make the most out of every day.

⭐ What Is Air Fryer
An air fryer is a small countertop convection oven designed to simulate deep frying without submerging the food in oil. A fan circulates hot air at high speed, producing a crisp layer via browning reactions. Cooking oil is not used in large quantities in an air fryer. Cooking times in the air fryer may be reduced by 20% or more, as compared to non-convection ovens.

⭐ Product Intro
Simplus brings the best to everyone’s home. Enjoy healthy food that's crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. Little or no oil is needed to ensure perfect texture and delicious results! Let the air fryer does the thinking and cooking for you.With the 8 preset menu, it can automatically adjusts time and temperature during cooking for perfectly cooked dishes. Select and enjoy every bite! 

⭐ Basic Info
· Model: KQZG005BK01-S
· Capacity: 5L
· Power: 1500w
· Timer: Max 60min
· Temperature: 80-200℃
· Digital Touch Screen
· 8 preset menu

⭐ How Tow Use
1. Put the grill into the frying basket. Add the ingredients into the basket.
2. Push the frying basket into the fryer. Set the time and temperature as you like.
3. During the process of frying, it's necessary to pull out the frying basket and  check the status of food to prevent it from being burnt.
4. After using, cool down the fryer. When cleaning the basket and grill, please DO NOT use sharp material to rub the surface.

results.title: PowerPac Ceramic Cooker Steamboat (Any Pot) 2000 Watts (PPIC832)
results.description:
• The infrared cooker makes use of far-infrared light to heat food. It is especially suitable for modern family cooking. Its main characteristics are as follows:

• High-tech, far-infrared heating: it uses the far infrared portion of the electromagnetic spectrum, which is entirely safe and poses no danger to health. It includes many cooking functions, including warming
• Any pot can be used, such as iron, aluminium, copper, ceramics, marmite heat-resistant glass and any heat-resistant utensil can be used as well
• Multi-function: Touch control, Timer function
• Environmentally-friendly: no fire, no smoke, no soot and no carbon monoxide
• Easy to clean: crystal glass plate
• Convenient: intelligent micro-computer control


•Among the many numerous Safety protections installed include:

• Over-heat protection: if the temperature of cooker surface is over 650 deg C, the cooker will be protected automatically
• Inner-temperature over-heat protection: when the inner temperature reaches 95 deg C, the cooker will be protected automatically
• High-voltage protection: once voltage is over 275 V, the cooker will shut off automatically
• Low-voltage protection: once voltage is under 95 V, the cooker will shut off automatically
• Constant-temperature over-heat protection: when the temperature of cooker surface reaches 580 deg C, the cooker will shut off automatically

PLEASE NOTE:
• Suitable for glass tables
• 'HOR' displayed on the screen meant the cooker is cooling down by fan after powering it off.


• Highly efficient infrared heating technology, faster than standard induction cookers
• Suitable for use with any types of pots and pans
• No high frequency electromagnetic radiation nor harmful substances produced (e.g. carbon monoxide) and/or used
• Cook safely without gas, fire, reducing pollution, which is environmentally-friendly
• Safe and easy to use
• Power Consumption: up to 2000W
• Voltage: 220V-240V
• Frequency: 50-60Hz
• Energy Efficiency: 93-94%
• Safety Mark: 140823-12
• Product Dimensions : 360 (L) x 280 (W) x 55 (H) mm
